translation.home-left-text: Do you have any ideas? Let's bring them to life together!
translation.about-left-text: Hi, I'm Leonardo, a full-stack software developer with a background from Boolean UK's 1,000+ hour bootcamp. I currently work at Bydas, focusing on e-commerce platforms with technologies like JavaScript, React, Node.js, PHP, and Shopify's Liquid. I'm also building AlgaID, a mobile app for algae identification, where I've led front-end development with React Native, API design in PHP, database setup in SQLite, and machine learning integration using Python and Google Cloud Vertex AI. I'm always exploring new tools like Next.js, Docker, and Java â€” and outside of coding, I'm passionate about chess.
translation.name: NAME
translation.omniloq-description: Encrypts every password, safely storing your accounts and logins. Create and save as many items you want. Available for desktop and mobile.
translation.wizard-description: Created for Wizard branches to manage and monitor their employees' work. Employees can register customers, and the company can easily access all data related to it.
